trans-unit.source: Azure HDInsight On-Demand Linked Service
trans-unit.target: Azure HDInsight On-Demand Linked Service

trans-unit.source: Azure HDInsight On-Demand Linked Service
trans-unit.target: Azure HDInsight On-Demand Linked Service

trans-unit.source: This topic provides the JSON format that is supported by the July 2015 Release of Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides the JSON format that is supported by the July 2015 Release of Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: If you are using an older version, see <link xlink:href="68e95b38-743b-46f0-9f40-29203c4bafbd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure HDInsight On-Demand Linked Service</link> for the old JSON format.
trans-unit.target: If you are using an older version, see <link xlink:href="68e95b38-743b-46f0-9f40-29203c4bafbd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure HDInsight On-Demand Linked Service</link> for the old JSON format.

trans-unit.source: You create an on-demand Azure HDInsight linked service to link an on-demand Azure HDInsight cluster to an Azure data factory.
trans-unit.target: You create an on-demand Azure HDInsight linked service to link an on-demand Azure HDInsight cluster to an Azure data factory.

trans-unit.source: This topic describes the JSON properties for defining an on-demand HDInsight linked service.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes the JSON properties for defining an on-demand HDInsight linked service.

trans-unit.source: When you use the Data Factory Editor in Azure Portal, the editor provides you a JSON template for defining a linked service that you can modify and deploy to create a linked service.
trans-unit.target: When you use the Data Factory Editor in Azure Portal, the editor provides you a JSON template for defining a linked service that you can modify and deploy to create a linked service.

trans-unit.source: To use the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.Azure.Commands.DataFactories.New-AzureDataFactoryLinkedService</codeEntityReference> cmdlet to create a linked service, you will need to create a JSON file and use it with the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: To use the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.Azure.Commands.DataFactories.New-AzureDataFactoryLinkedService</codeEntityReference> cmdlet to create a linked service, you will need to create a JSON file and use it with the cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: The on-demand HDInsight cluster is automatically created by the Azure Data Factory service to process data.
trans-unit.target: The on-demand HDInsight cluster is automatically created by the Azure Data Factory service to process data.

trans-unit.source: The on-demand HDInsight cluster is created in the data center location that is same as that of the storage account (linkedServiceName property in the JSON) associated with the on-demand HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: The on-demand HDInsight cluster is created in the data center location that is same as that of the storage account (linkedServiceName property in the JSON) associated with the on-demand HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: You will not see it created in your subscription; the Azure Data Factory service manages the on-demand HDInsight cluster for you.
trans-unit.target: You will not see it created in your subscription; the Azure Data Factory service manages the on-demand HDInsight cluster for you.

trans-unit.source: The logs for the jobs that are run on the on-demand HDInsight cluster are copied to the storage account associated with the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: The logs for the jobs that are run on the on-demand HDInsight cluster are copied to the storage account associated with the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: You can access these logs from the Data Factory portal in the <embeddedLabel>Activity Run Details</embeddedLabel> blade.
trans-unit.target: You can access these logs from the Data Factory portal in the <embeddedLabel>Activity Run Details</embeddedLabel> blade.

trans-unit.source: It takes 15+ minutes for the HDInsight cluster to be created on demand.
trans-unit.target: It takes 15+ minutes for the HDInsight cluster to be created on demand.

trans-unit.source: You will be charged only for the time when the HDInsight cluster is up and running jobs.
trans-unit.target: You will be charged only for the time when the HDInsight cluster is up and running jobs.

trans-unit.source: Properties
trans-unit.target: Properties

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: type
trans-unit.target: type

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>type</embeddedLabel> property should be set to <embeddedLabel>HDInsightOnDemand</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>type</embeddedLabel> property should be set to <embeddedLabel>HDInsightOnDemand</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: clusterSize
trans-unit.target: clusterSize

trans-unit.source: The size of the on-demand cluster.
trans-unit.target: The size of the on-demand cluster.

trans-unit.source: Specify how many nodes you want to be in this on-demand cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specify how many nodes you want to be in this on-demand cluster.

trans-unit.source: jobscontainer
trans-unit.target: jobscontainer

trans-unit.source: The blob container that holds data used by pig/hive/package jobs and where the cluster logs will be stored.
trans-unit.target: The blob container that holds data used by pig/hive/package jobs and where the cluster logs will be stored.

trans-unit.source: timetolive
trans-unit.target: timetolive

trans-unit.source: Specifies how long the on-demand HDInsight cluster stays alive after it is done with processing a slice.
trans-unit.target: Specifies how long the on-demand HDInsight cluster stays alive after it is done with processing a slice.

trans-unit.source: If another slice needs to be processed while this cluster is alive, the slice is processed by the same cluster.
trans-unit.target: If another slice needs to be processed while this cluster is alive, the slice is processed by the same cluster.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the processing of a slice takes 6 minutes and timetolive is set to 5 minutes, the cluster stays alive for 5 minutes after the 6 minutes of processing the current slice.
trans-unit.target: For example, if the processing of a slice takes 6 minutes and timetolive is set to 5 minutes, the cluster stays alive for 5 minutes after the 6 minutes of processing the current slice.

trans-unit.source: If another slice is ready to run, the slice is processed by the same cluster.
trans-unit.target: If another slice is ready to run, the slice is processed by the same cluster.

trans-unit.source: The cluster stays alive for 5 minutes after processing the second slice.
trans-unit.target: The cluster stays alive for 5 minutes after processing the second slice.

trans-unit.source: Basically, as long as the cluster is not idle for more than timetolive, it stays alive to process more slices.
trans-unit.target: Basically, as long as the cluster is not idle for more than timetolive, it stays alive to process more slices.

trans-unit.source: Creating an on-demand HDInsight cluster is an expensive operation (could take a while), so use this setting as needed to improve performance of a data factory by reusing an on-demand HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Creating an on-demand HDInsight cluster is an expensive operation (could take a while), so use this setting as needed to improve performance of a data factory by reusing an on-demand HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: If you set this value to 0, the cluster is deleted as soon as the slice is processed.
trans-unit.target: If you set this value to 0, the cluster is deleted as soon as the slice is processed.

trans-unit.source: If you set a high value and it stays idle because there are no slices to process, you incur unnecessary charges from running the cluster.
trans-unit.target: If you set a high value and it stays idle because there are no slices to process, you incur unnecessary charges from running the cluster.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you set it an appropriate value to suit your needs.
trans-unit.target: Therefore, you set it an appropriate value to suit your needs.

trans-unit.source: TimeToLive property cross the pipeline boundaries.
trans-unit.target: TimeToLive property cross the pipeline boundaries.

trans-unit.source: If two pipelines (or actually activities in the pipelines) point to the same on-demand HDInsight cluster, they may use the same instance of on-demand HDInsight cluster, i.e., slices processed by these two pipelines may share the same on-demand HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: If two pipelines (or actually activities in the pipelines) point to the same on-demand HDInsight cluster, they may use the same instance of on-demand HDInsight cluster, i.e., slices processed by these two pipelines may share the same on-demand HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: version
trans-unit.target: version

trans-unit.source: Version of the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Version of the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: This property is optional.
trans-unit.target: This property is optional.

trans-unit.source: linkedServiceName
trans-unit.target: linkedServiceName

trans-unit.source: The blob store to be used by the on-demand cluster for storing and processing data.
trans-unit.target: The blob store to be used by the on-demand cluster for storing and processing data.

trans-unit.source: additionalLinkedServiceNames
trans-unit.target: additionalLinkedServiceNames

trans-unit.source: Specifies additional storage accounts for the HDInsight linked service so that the Data Factory service can register them on your behalf.
trans-unit.target: Specifies additional storage accounts for the HDInsight linked service so that the Data Factory service can register them on your behalf.

trans-unit.source: You can also specify the following properties for creating/configuring the on-demand HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: You can also specify the following properties for creating/configuring the on-demand HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: coreConfiguration
trans-unit.target: coreConfiguration

trans-unit.source: Specifies the core configuration parameters (as in core-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster to be created.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the core configuration parameters (as in core-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster to be created.

trans-unit.source: hBaseConfiguration
trans-unit.target: hBaseConfiguration

trans-unit.source: Specifies the HBase configuration parameters (hbase-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the HBase configuration parameters (hbase-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: hdfsConfiguration
trans-unit.target: hdfsConfiguration

trans-unit.source: Specifies the HDFS configuration parameters (hdfs-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the HDFS configuration parameters (hdfs-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: hiveConfiguration
trans-unit.target: hiveConfiguration

trans-unit.source: Specifies the hive configuration parameters (hive-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the hive configuration parameters (hive-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: mapReduceConfiguration
trans-unit.target: mapReduceConfiguration

trans-unit.source: Specifies the MapReduce configuration parameters (mapred-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the MapReduce configuration parameters (mapred-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: oozieConfiguration
trans-unit.target: oozieConfiguration

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Oozie configuration parameters (oozie-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the Oozie configuration parameters (oozie-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: stormConfiguration
trans-unit.target: stormConfiguration

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Storm configuration parameters (storm-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the Storm configuration parameters (storm-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: yarnConfiguration
trans-unit.target: yarnConfiguration

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Yarn configuration parameters (yarn-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the Yarn configuration parameters (yarn-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: See the <link xlink:href="68e95b38-743b-46f0-9f40-29203c4bafbd#Example3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Example 3 – with cluster creation parameters</link> section for an example of using some of these properties.
trans-unit.target: See the <link xlink:href="68e95b38-743b-46f0-9f40-29203c4bafbd#Example3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Example 3 – with cluster creation parameters</link> section for an example of using some of these properties.
